review_text: Such a beautiful house in a great quiet location tucked in the trees. The neighborhood was great and Kathys house was perfect spot to relax after travel and activities. The back porch is amazing with birds chirping and deer roaming outside of back yard fence on property. Everything was clean and in working order. The beds were very comfortable and couch and lounging chair. Huge tv in living room as well. I would highly recommend kathys house.

Kathy’s place was perfect! By far the best air bnb I have found so far in Duncan. Clean, comfortable and very peaceful. Everything that you could possibly need is right there for you. And the bathtub was the best bonus to the stay! Can’t wait to stay again here soon.

I had a very pleasant stay at Kathy’s Home, so much so I’m going to miss the place. The neighbors are great in a nice neighborhood. Oh almost forgot You have deer come right up on the fence line if you pay attention at night you can see them or early morning .
Kathy was such an amazing host. We had some last-minute accommodations that she was able to do right away. We were so grateful! Thank you, Kathy, for sharing your home with us.
Everything was as I expected and the owner is extremely accommodating and pleasant to deal with. I will not hesitate staying there again.

Kathy has a lovely home and a large peaceful backyard with comfortable rockers so that you can enjoy the Oklahoma evening breeze and a beautiful sunset after a long day. The home had everything we needed to make our stay an enjoyable one including a computer desk, propane grill, dishwasher, robot vacuum, & plenty of extra blankets and towels. There are 4 of us and we all had plenty of room without feeling like we were on top of one another, which is always appreciated when you’re traveling with children. I spent a good bit of time soaking in the jacuzzi tub and reading a book for some much needed alone time. We would absolutely stay here again.
Was my first stay at a bnb and exceeded all my expectations. Kathy went above and beyond in her duty as a host. Will definitely be back in the future.
This stay is SO CUTE! If that was the only perk it would be enough, but Jana is the best B&B host we’ve ever had. So accommodating!
Enjoyed our stay! House was great, spacious, clean, convenient to everything we needed. Beautifully decorated.

The Emerald Bungalow was absolutely fabulous! The decor was amazing ! The rooms were spacious and beautifully decorated. I have stayed in many Airbnbs but this was one of my very favorites! Duncan has a jewel in this one. Thank you, Jana, for offering such a lovely place to stay! I highly recommend it if you visit Duncan.
Easy check in! Great location and very charming!
I’ll be honest, we didn’t have very high expectations coming into Duncan. But our group was extremely impressed with this place. Beautiful home!

The Emerald Bungalow was absolutely perfect. We got a little bit early check in and allowed to check out a bit late. It was so cute and everything was just what we needed to make our "Sister" trip perfect. We did alot of shopping, but mostly stayed right there in the bungalow and visited. The place was so comfortable and relaxing. Jana was just as sweet as she could be and so helpful!!

Saying that I enjoyed my time staying in this place would be an understatement. It is nice and quiet as it is located in a peaceful neighborhood. The check-in was quick and easy and Jana made sure I had everything I needed throughout my stay. She even measured the bathroom door for me before I arrived to make sure my wheelchair would fit through; this really meant a lot to me. It's a very accessible home and the decor is absolutely stunning. Organized, spacious, clean, relaxing, and serene are just a number of words I can use to describe this lovely home. I was also able to use the TV to watch my Dallas Mavericks play against the OKC Thunder in the playoffs. The dining room table was huge and allowed me to spread out and work accordingly. This place is amazing and I'm hoping to come back sometime in the future.
Thank You Jana!
The home was beautiful and we really enjoyed our stay!
Amazing! Photos do not do even do it justice. Didn’t want to leave!
Beautiful home in Duncan! We loved the decor and there was plenty of space to spread out. Would happily stay here again.

What a great reprieve after a long day! It was so nice to come back to a home away from home while we were in Duncan. It was comfortable, had everything we needed and more. Jana was quick to respond and a generous host. We would love to stay here again!
Thank you for the wonderful stay during our out-of-state trip. It was relaxing and comfy.
It is a beautiful home. It was perfect for us and easy to get to everywhere in Duncan. We loved it.
Loved our stay, the place was beautiful!! Host was a Gem!! Will definitely return!!
A wonderful home that is clean, cozy and beautifully decorated. Jana is very kind and easy to communicate with. We highly recommend this home and look forward to returning!
Beautiful and artful. Felt like home! Very cozy!

Great place and super cute! Beds were very comfortable, especially after a long day of driving, which is hard to find sometimes so that was an immediate plus in my book. Very clean, she was very helpful also with offering to bring extra coffee if needed, outdoor lighting, just overall a very proactive and responsive host and we’d love to come back again when passing back through.
Beautiful comfortable home. Close to everything. Jana was a great host. We will definitely stay again.
The house was amazing! We loved the way it was decorated and the layout was perfect for our family. Each room had its own special ambiance that really made it feel like home!

The Emerald Bungalow is a lovely home where great attention has been paid to every detail. My 70-80 year old family rented it to come together for a funeral. I cannot say enough nice things. They loved the beds, the kitchen had everything that they needed, and there was ample seating for the whole family both in the living area and the dining area. Everything about being here was easy; it was something we really appreciated even more during a trying time.

Met in person once, super nice, very professional. ￼
She was very welcoming. ￼And she was accommodating for my service dog. ￼
Overall extremely clean house, and the kitchen was in A+ 100!
I would absolutely stay there over and over again. ￼
And the double driveway was a plus, so my coworker and I would not get into the way of one another.
If you’re on business, especially with other people, this is your place!
Stellar house! Clean and very hospitable host.
This house was absolutely perfect, kitchen had everything we needed. Beds were super comfortable and rooms were all so cute! Thanks for letting us stay in your house!
Our stay was wonderful. It’s such a beautiful, unique place. We were comfortable and felt right at home. Jana is a very proactive and helpful host. Highly recommend and would stay again.
Lots of room so you don’t have to be on top of each other. Well equipped kitchen.

The house was a great option while we were visiting family who live in Duncan. All three bedrooms were comfortable, and the two bathrooms were conveniently located in the house to be shared. The best part was the comfortable open well stocked kitchen that connected to the dining room with a large table and the living room. This will become our go to place to stay when in Duncan.
Absolutely gorgeous home. The beds were so comfortable.
Jana was a great host! Home was comfy and decorated beautifully! Highly recommended!

Our stay at the Emerald Bungalow exceeded all expectations! Jana thoughtfully decorated the entire house for Christmas. Absolutely beautiful! Jana replied to any questions I had immediately. I would highly recommend staying here,and I look forward to staying again.

A great place for the family to gather for the holidays that was amazingly dressed for Christmas.
Felt like home and will recommend highly.
Beds were comfortable with top of the line linens.
My nephew who lives in Tulsa and spends Christmas in Duncan promised to try to spend future times in the house if available.

Speechless honestly! This stay is absolutely beautiful! They took so much time decorating, and everything was so well thought out!
Pictures don’t do it justice! It was hands down the most beautiful stay I have ever stayed in.
The entire house was very well stocked for everything anyone/family would need.
The personal touch of the welcome note was great as well.
Would definitely stay again and highly recommend this stay for anyone wanting a home away from home!
Very nice place

We were fortunate enough to visit during the holidays! The Emerald Bungalow looked like something right off the hallmark channel! Gorgeous!! We will definitely add this place to our favorite list for future visits!

The Emerald Bungalow is so cute and quaint. The decor is perfect. Great property. Jana is amazing and went out of her way to make our stay special. I highly recommend this place instead of hotel room. Great price and you’ll fall in love with the property.

This house is comfortable and close to everything in Duncan. The bedrooms were very spacious and the beds were very comfortable. All the coffee, snacks, and kitchen amenities were very nice. Thanks for letting us stay. We would definitely stay again.
Such a lovely house! Perfect location quiet neighborhood. My family and I loved it! Definitely felt like home away from home
It was very clean and comfortable. Had 2 driveways to park in and the home decor was so on point

Everything your looking for in a Airbnb, The Emerald Bungalow is the place! Great Communication with our Host, Safe & Friendly Neighborhood, Clean & Well Stocked for all your needs. Super Super Cute, Beautiful Artwork, Comfy Beds, Warm & Inviting. This Is Your Place to Stay!!
GREAT PLACE

After the initial address mix up, everything fell into place. The home was everything we were hoping for. There were 2 adults and 3 children and plenty of room for all of us. The house was spacious and homey. We were in walking distance to downtown, where we found nice shops and a couple of neat eating places. A quick drive down the road took us to a grocery store and a park for the kids. There are many shopping and eating establishments to choose from in Duncan. We were extremely happy with our experience and are planning the bungalow for our vacation again next year. Jana was very kind and quick to respond.
beautiful and comfortable house to stay
The place was beautiful and spacious. The host was most gracious! Will definite be using this rental anytime family or friends come to town. Highly recommend! Thank you so much miss Jana!!!
Our stay was the wonderful! Perfect for my bridal party to get ready 🤍 our photographer said the place was perfect for wedding pictures!! Highly recommended to brides!

After a little confusion finding the house (city changed the addresses on the street), when we arrived the house was great!
Spacious with plenty of room to move around, but also with ample seating.
Nicely decorated and stocked kitchen.
Comfortable beds for restful sleeping.
Smart tv to watch a movie or shows.
Yahtzee board game to have a game night.
Front porch has a swing and chair to enjoy your morning coffee.
Side yard was good size to play catch (baseball/football).
Great place to stay while in Duncan
The Emerald Bungalow is a great escape. Our family loved the home and was able to spend quality time together and have plenty of space to relax. The decor is amazing as well.
The vibes were wonderful! The colors. The class. Everything was perfectly placed with care. From the books to the beds!! We will def book again when in the area!!
Loved our stay at Vicki’s place! Very comfortable and had everything we needed to feel right at home.
Very cute home, and was an amazing stay. We had no issues at all, and our dogs loved it. The home was very peaceful and clean. Would stay again if ever in the area!
I think the host was wonderful. The house is adorable and in a great space we really enjoyed it a lot!
The house was so lovely decorated and the neighborhood was very quiet. We had a wonderful stay.
We enjoyed our stay and Vicki made sure we had everything we needed for our time there.

Vicki was a great communicator. We have stayed here before and really enjoy the large kitchen. We especially like the extended porch - we had great weather and could sit out there and watch our grand daughter play.

This is the 4th time we have stayed at Vicki's place and we love it. We come to town a few times a year to visit family and friends and this AirB&B is a great option for more room, privacy, and a home away from home feel.
Great place great host and will stay there again when we’re in the area
Very good host. Very responsive and the place was super nice and clean.

Vickie's place was as stated , great place for us hunters.
when I step into the house the AC should have been left on it was 80° inside there it took a while to cool the house down. but other then that it was a nice little place

Vicki ‘s place was just as described. It is charming and very comfortable. Communication with Vicki was very easy. She’s very responsive. The house had a welcome packet with suggestions for restaurants things to do and necessary information. The neighborhood is quiet. I highly recommend Vicki ‘s and will definitely stay there again.
Cute home with a very comfortable and homey feel. Exactly as described. Enjoyed our stay. Vicki was a great host and very responsive.

Duncan is an historic town full if lovely and lovingly maintained homes. Vicki’s place is on a quiet safe street. The house is clearly marked and easy to find. It is a short drive downtown to some amazing local restaurants. If the Duncan area is your destination, let Vicki’s place welcome you.
nice place easy to get to. just as described. highly recommend
We were very impressed with the house. Everyone kept saying " l'm so glad we stayed here". It had everything we needed and very relaxing, which I really needed. We will be back and stay here again.
The house is clean and beautiful! The host is super nice and responds quickly to any needs. It’s super close to family we were visiting. I plan on booking again for any trips back to Duncan!
Comfortable place. Close to the main streets. Easy to find. Host is very responsive.
Adorable little house! Very clean! Host was very responsive and flexible when needed.
This house was as represented, it was clean and in decent condition.

When we travel to Duncan, we look forward to staying at this AirBnB. We know there will be no surprises, no negative incidents, and a host that is 100% in your corner. We had an unusual special request that she approved quickly, without hesitation, even though she certainly did not have any obligation to do so. You can't ask for a better experience!
We enjoyed our stay! The house was cool and welcoming. Beds were comfy!
My husband and I enjoyed staying at this cozy little home. I loved the cute Lemon kitchen theme. Everything was very nice! We plan on staying there again when we are back in the area!
Vicki, Is a wonderful host. Definitely makes you feel like your at home. I will definitely come back to her home and refer her to anyone and everyone.

Check in was flawless. There was a a welcome packet that helped us navigate our first airbnb experience. Soooo helpful! There were some local attractions, recommendations for places to eat, and rules of the house in the packet. Priceless. I loved the hands free experience of airbnbs. If the other airbnbs are like this one…., good bye Hotels!!!
Excellent host.
My family had a wonderful trip.
Vicki’s place was great! Well kept and clean with everything you might need. The air conditioning kept the place cool and the wifi was great for working remotely.

Do you have a favorite pair of jeans that are always comfortable? That is how we feel when we get to stay here. You will want for nothing. Easy, easy in and out, communication and check-out instructions. Great wi-fi and cable. Makes you so comfortable, you forget you are not at home!
We liked the place it was great...

Vicki was a wonderful host and incredibly flexible with our weird schedule and hours. She kept the place in pristine condition and we are incredibly happy with the quality of our stay. We plan to rent this lodging again when we find ourselves back in Duncan!
This house was adorable! Everything including the beds were so so comfortable.

Vicki's place was definitely a place I would come back to and recommend to anyone. Great Host, with a lovely home with everything and more! Vicki is very accommodating. I loved the binder with all the information about the house and info about Duncan. Thanks for having us. We enjoyed it.
Vicki’s place was amazing! Was very cozy and the beds were extremely comfortable! Would definitely stay again
Vicki’s listing was just how she described. Everything was great and I would stay there again!
Vicki thought about everything you could possibly need and made the experience a home away from home feeling.
Very clean and nice house. Would recommend. The beds were very comfortable and it had a “homey” feel. Was able to get much needed rest there!
Nice, clean house. Easy to find. Very comfortable bed! The bathroom is so nice, great shower. Really appreciate that is is dog friendly.
I really enjoyed my stay. FYI the water pressure and how long the water stays hot is wonderful.
I've stayed here twice & had zero problems. Vicki is very quick & friendly with her responses. I will try to stay here every time I come to Duncan, Ok.

We stayed at Vicki’s Place over the Easter weekend and event hosted Easter for our family. The place was perfect, and we had everything that we needed. We traveled in from SC and brought a lot with us, but there were stores close enough to get what else we needed. We would definitely stay here again! Softest sheets ever!
This home was so beautiful, and Vicki was the best host! She ensured we had everything we needed during our stay. Highly recommend staying here!
Great place to stay. Beautiful cottage. Very clean and comfortable
Great place to stay. Well kept. Quiet neighborhood.
This was a very cozy stay

Great stay. Great house!

I travel monthly for my job, and get so tired of the "Institutional" feel of hotels. It is comforting to find a place like Vicki's so you can fall into the clean, attractive, and very comfortable arms of a home. We found everything we needed to snuggle down and rejuvenate ourselves and especially when you wake up to a cold, snowy day. Thank you Vicki! We hope this place is available when we have to come back to Duncan.
We had a great stay look forward to going back!

Really Happy with our choice to stay at Vicki's place. It is a cute, cozy little place perfect for our size family. The Christmas decorations showed such attention to detail! My only recommendation would be to potentially allow for a later check out time if there isn't an immediate booking that they need to prepare for. I would definitely recommend Vicki's, except for the weekends that we hope to stay there, cause We Will Definitely Return!

It’s was wonderful place to stay while visiting people in the area! Would definitely book again!
Vicki’s place was very cozy and we had a comfortable stay. We will definitely book this house again in the future.. Thank you Vicki
Very clean, thoughtful design, comfy bed, clean bathroom, nice tub, easy off-street parking, cute Christmas lights, clean fridge, nice A/C…. Great value!
Really cozy place. Quiet neighborhood. Comfortable beds and nice linens. Great price.

Perfect place to stay and visit with our mother who lives in a Duncan assisted living apartment. Close to everything Duncan has to offer. I highly recommend this place. I will check availability here before anywhere else in Duncan.

Vicki's little house is very convenient and cozy, giving us exactly what we needed to recover our rest for the next day of traveling. Well-supplied and comfortable, it was also quiet and safe in the neighborhood.
Had a great stay. Neighborhood was quiet and felt safe. Enjoyed having some of the amenities that were available.
very nice place to stay! very clean and comfortable!
Cute house that was just what we were looking for. Vicki was good communicator and great value for the reasonable cost! Will definitely plan to stay there again!

Best Air BNB we've stayed at. It was clean-clean-clean. The house was well stocked with peripherals which made it a hassle free stay. Our host was wonderful and quickly responded to any of our needs. It's more than a 5 star review. Stay here if you are in Duncan!

My son and I had to come to town for a funeral and didn’t want to board our dog and Vicki’s place was amazing with all the perfect amenities! The house was cozy and perfect! I loved all the extra touches to make it feel like home!
Very clean, comfortable, & relaxing. We will be visiting again in the future. 10* out of 10*
Great place. Very cozy
It was peaceful and lovely
Excellent response time and felt so welcome and comfortable! Vicki is Excellent
The house was great!
Love this cute home. Great space inside and out. Definitely plan on staying again when we come back to Duncan. Vicki was amazing with communicating with me and making sure all needs were met.

Mrs. Vicki, has truly been such a blessing and support with my moms stay. She has been so generous taking care of everything and making sure that My mom and her caregiver would have a very comfortable stay here. I highly recommend her Airbnb and we are definitely looking forward for my mom to come back and stay at her place. My mom Loved every single thing about the place and the amenities and how comfortable everything was. The beds were amazing and she was able to sleep so good. Everything was inaccessible reach. I highly recommend Mrs. Vickis place. she was an extremely wonderful and caring host for us!!!

The location was easy to find and the check in was seamless. It is not too far from anything in town. The house has plenty of room and I enjoyed all the little touches. It stayed nice and cool during the warm weather. The kitchen was stocked and provided plenty of space to cook. Would stay here again if needed.

A very clean and cozy cottage!! Bed was very comfortable! Enjoyed the extra touches of coffee, tea, snacks and chocolate. Very cute and comfortable
This was a great place to stay, comfortable and peaceful. The host was great! I will stay here again next time I am in the area.
Very clean and wonderful stay. Beds were comfortable. Will stay there again. Fantastic value!!!

Cozy, comfy. quiet and clean, with a charming decor. Everything you need for recharging during a trip is provided here. The neighborhood is in the midst of revival but is friendly and safe. Walking nearby is rewarding because of the mix of architectural styles. The hosts have provided everything else! We found it to be a nicer place to rest than any local hotel might have been.
Wonderful place to stay. Very cute house and super comfortable beds. My grandsons and I had a great time.
great location and a great stay.
A very clean and comfortable place at a good value for the 2 of us and our 2 dogs.

My wife and I really enjoyed staying here. Clean, comfortable and quiet. Kitchen is well stocked. Snacks, coffee and tea were appreciated. Plenty of towels. Decorated nicely. Look forward to staying here again.

The place was very clean and organized with everything you need for weekend getaway. Vicki was very polite, easy to work with, and was very responsive to any concerns that I had. Would definitely recommend staying here.
Lovely home, amazing host and great price! I highly recommend staying at this Airbnb!!

If you ever go to Duncan this is a great place to stay!! It is perfectly cozy and wonderful! Super clean and has everything you could possibly need! If this is available next time we will stay again! Loved everything about it and the check in was simple.
A cozy little home but the view leaves a little to be desired.
Very nice and quiet area. Nice little place. Would probably choose this again if we come to the area.

very homey and comfy little house. I was traveling for business and I work nights. its was quiet during the day. The weather was all over the place and it was warm and cool when needed. Also it was a great location

The outside and the surrogate beautiful.

I highly recommend this lovely Tiny House you won’t be disappointed.

The place was great, just as described and close to the wedding we attended.
It was a very nice place
Another great stay with Traci! This time it was the tiny house. Quaint and cute. Clean and comfortable. Thanks again Traci for being a wonderful host.
Cute little tiny house. Had everything we needed for our 2 night stay. Relaxing back yard.
my husband and I stayed at the tiny house for a short visit with our daughter. the bed was very comfortable and the home was very clean.

Not the first time that we have stayed at this persons locations, and not the last! I travel to Duncan for work, and all of her places are great to come “home” to at the end of the day. Thanks for clean and cool places to stay!
Second time staying here. Felt right at home.

So we’ll decorated & lots of outdoor space ( fenced for dog a big plus) I did all the cooking for all our meals while there an absolutely didn’t need a thing ever utensil every pot or pan I could need was there. So many extras one of the best air B&Bs I’ve ever stayed in.
Absolutely cute place! we Enjoyed our time and can't wait for next year!

Loved it! Will plan to stay again if we’re back in Duncan!!
Always enjoy my stay! Cute, clean, nice porches front and back!

Me and my partner really enjoyed our little escape from the kids for the evening. I will absolutely book this place again and for the price you can’t beat it. The value is incredible.
The place was perfect for our needs. Wonderfully decorated and felt right at home!
Tracy was great to work with. The place is very cute and comfortable. It was very restful for our 18 hour stay.
This is the 4th or 5th time I've stayed at the Tiny House and I'll use it any time I'm in town if it's available.

Love the Tiny House! Third time there and always our first choice when in Duncan!!

A great little get away. Very peaceful and loved seeing the Deer in The morning. I would stay if here close by.
This place was such a peaceful haven! Very clean, creatively decorated, and wonderfully comfortable. Perfect for what I needed!

what a great place to get away tla d relax. although I worked while staying here, I did enjoy it. the patio was a great place to sit and enjoy nature. the fire pit was a great touch.loved sitting by the fire.

very nice place, clean, everything we needed. loved the backyard where we could take dog out. will stay again if up that way.

As always we enjoy the comfort and coziness of the tiny house. it’s very clean and close to where we need to be. Very nice decor.cute little house .

A patient and understanding host, looking forward to coming back.
Always such a wonderful stay… it feels like home every time we stay. Can’t wait to come back.
Super cute little house. Will definitely be staying there again!

We will definitely be back!

This is a gem! Quiet and peaceful. Creatively decorated. Spectacular host!
Great stay!
Had a wonderful stay, we will definitely be back!
Loved staying at the tiny house. Peaceful and relaxing. Traci is a great host. Highly recommend!

Just a great place to stay for one person or a couple. Darn cute and it feels so homey when you arrive. Traci left interior and exterior lights on which is great!!!
We loved the tiny house and will definitely stay here again!

Always great staying with Traci. Highly recommend.

Do you like peace and quiet? What about comfortable accommodations? Beautiful surroundings and people that make you feel completely at home? If so, do yourself a favor and book this spot now! The magic of this beautifully decorated barn is not just the rustic decor but also the obvious care, warmth, and charisma the owners bring to the space. The interior is absolutely exquisite with hand-finished reclaimed wood planks on the walls, black and white checkerboard tile in the bathroom, and exposed rafters strung with lights you can switch on that make it look like you are sleeping under a starry sky. The open floor plan boasts delightfully comfy sofas and an amazing old-fashioned leather recliner, a retro dining table, a vintage piano to plink around on, plus a flat-screen TV complete with DVD player and WiFi. The kitchen has a full-sized fridge and sink, toaster oven, microwave, and Keurig coffee maker with all the fixings. The farmhouse bed is comfy and has plenty of pillows. The walk-in shower has excellent water pressure, plenty of hot water, and a tiled bench. Out back there is a patio perfect for grilling, complete with a table and umbrella for meals or just hanging out, and a chimenea. The chimenea is fully stocked and ready to go; it only took one match to light (seriously, it was impressive!). The salt-water pool out front is beautifully maintained, ranges from around 3 to 10 feet deep (with a diving board at the deep end), and has plenty of places to lounge and relax. The covered patio is perfect for long conversations day or night. I could go on and on, but the best part is that these folks are some of the best people you could hope to meet! Lois and Pam are thoughtful, considerate, good-hearted people who genuinely enjoy sharing their excellent venue with others. Bottom line: if you like taking it easy in beautiful natural surroundings and rustic luxury provided by a couple of amazing people, book this spot today!
